movies.title: As Good as It Gets
movies.Plot: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

movies.title: Sliding Doors
movies.Plot: After personal and professional setbacks, a woman experiences an alternate reality.

movies.title: Groundhog Day
movies.Plot: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.Plot: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.title: Crossroads
movies.Plot: Three childhood friends embark on a cross-country adventure to pursue dreams they once put aside, taking risks that are sure to change their lives forever.

movies.title: Mr. Deeds
movies.Plot: A sweet-natured small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way.

movies.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
movies.Plot: An advertising executive and ladies' man, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days.

movies.title: Anything Else
movies.Plot: Jerry Falk learns a lesson the hard way when he falls in love with the beautiful but flighty Amanda.

movies.title: She's Gotta Have It
movies.Plot: Story of a woman and her three lovers.

movies.title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
movies.Plot: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love fo...

movies.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
movies.Plot: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

movies.title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
movies.Plot: During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.

movies.title: Mere Yaar Ki Shaadi Hai
movies.Plot: Sanjay wakes up to the truth that he loves his best friend Sanjana reluctantly but surely and sets off on a noble mission - to break her wedding.

movies.title: Main Hoon Na
movies.Plot: An army major goes undercover as a college student. His mission is both professional and personal: to protect his general's daughter from a radical militant, and to find his estranged half-brother.

movies.title: Hum Tum
movies.Plot: A novel look at the eternal battle of the sexes and the trials and tribulations of Karan and Rhea and their attempts to understand each other.

movies.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
movies.Plot: A husband and wife struggle to keep their marriage alive until they realize they are both secretly working as assassins. Now, their respective assignments require them to kill each other.

movies.title: Bunty Aur Babli
movies.Plot: A small-town pair become the legendary Bunty and Babli, turning the world on its head caper after caper--until they meet a very upset police officer.

movies.title: Ta Ra Rum Pum
movies.Plot: Ace car racer RV and his wife have the world at their feet. But he has an accident and his world is turned upside down. Can he reclaim his lost glory?

movies.title: Jhoom Barabar Jhoom
movies.Plot: A crazy love story full of lies, deceits and a complicated quadrangle where each one has to think quickly and dance around each other's emotions.

movies.title: Aaja Nachle
movies.Plot: Dia's dance teacher is dying. She returns to the town where she learnt to live and dance and most importantly to save the endangered Ajanta theatre.

movies.title: Om Shanti Om
movies.Plot: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

movies.title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
movies.Plot: A breathtaking, goose flesh igniting, awe inspiring love journey of an ordinary man Suri and his 'total opposite' love Taani.

movies.title: Bride Wars
movies.Plot: Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day.

movies.title: The Ugly Truth
movies.Plot: An uptight television producer takes control of a morning show segment on modern relationships hosted by a misogynistic man.

movies.title: Confessions of a Shopaholic
movies.Plot: A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur.

movies.title: Dostana
movies.Plot: Two straight guys pretend to be gay to secure a Miami apartment. When both of them fall for their roommate Neha, hilarity ensues as they strive to convince one and all that they're gay while secretly trying to win her heart.

movies.title: The Rebound
movies.Plot: In New York City, a single mom captivates her new neighbor, a much younger man.

movies.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
movies.Plot: In New York City, an estranged couple who witness a murder are relocated to small town Wyoming as part of the Witness Protection Program.

movies.title: Dil Bole Hadippa!
movies.Plot: In a village where girls don't play cricket, Veera puts on a turban and beard and becomes Veer to fulfill her dreams and meets Rohan. And fun begins.

movies.title: Pyaar Impossible
movies.Plot: Everybody loves beautiful Alisha and it's no surprise that nerdy Abhay loves her too but she doesn't know he exists until years later their paths cross.

movies.title: Just Go With It
movies.Plot: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.

movies.title: Friends with Benefits
movies.Plot: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

movies.title: Band Baaja Baaraat
movies.Plot: Shruti and Bittoo become partners in their very own "Wedding planning ka bijness" in Delhi and in the process discover friendship, love and one another.

movies.title: Luv Ka The End
movies.Plot: Rhea, the girl next door falls in love with Luv Nanda, only to find out he is not as nice as she thought he was. She decides to get even with Luv Nanda.

movies.title: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
movies.Plot: A quirky rom-com where Kush finds the ideal Indian bride Dimple for his brother Luv and a series of comical and unpredictable events follow.

movies.title: Student of the Year
movies.Plot: Several alumni reminisce about their final year at St. Theresa's College and the events that shaped their lives.

movies.title: Mujhse Fraaandship Karoge
movies.Plot: When you can't make it on your own, the best thing to do is to fake it. But, the question remains, how long can you fake true love?

movies.title: Ladies vs Ricky Bahl
movies.Plot: A smooth and charming conman, Ricky Bahl, cons girls for a living but finally meets his match is this fun-filled "ROM-CON."

movies.title: Moonrise Kingdom
movies.Plot: Two 12-year-olds, who live on an island, fall in love with each other and elope into the wilderness. While people set out on a search mission, a violent storm approaching them catches their attention.

movies.title: Hit & Run
movies.Plot: Four friends hit a man while driving and must dispose of the body.

movies.title: This Is 40
movies.Plot: Pete and Debbie are both about to turn 40, their kids hate each other, both of their businesses are failing, they're on the verge of losing their house, and their relationship is threatening to fall apart.

movies.title: Chennai Express
movies.Plot: A man travelling to Rameswaram via Chennai express for his late grandfather's ashes immersion finds himself in trouble after helping a don's daughter and her cousins board the train.

movies.title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
movies.Plot: Kabir and Naina bond during a trekking trip. Before Naina can express herself, Kabir leaves India to pursue his career. They meet again years later, but he still cherishes his dreams more than bonds.

movies.title: Kick
movies.Plot: An adrenaline junkie walks away from a whirlwind romance and embraces a new life as a thief, though he soon finds himself pursued by veteran police officer and engaged in a turf war with a local gangster.

movies.title: PK
movies.Plot: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religious views on people.

movies.title: Bewakoofiyaan
movies.Plot: Bewakoofiyaan is a slice-of life comedy when recession strikes and the lack of money tests love. Is living on love and fresh air really possible?

movies.title: Daawat-e-Ishq
movies.Plot: A story of Gullu, a Hyderabadi girl frustrated with dowry-seeking men and Taru (a charming Lucknawi cook), who crush old-fashioned world-view.

movies.title: Sleeping with Other People
movies.Plot: A good-natured womanizer and a serial cheater form a platonic relationship that helps reform them in ways, while a mutual attraction sets in.

movies.title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
movies.Plot: A girl from Ambala, Kavya Pratap Singh, is about to be married. When she visits Delhi to shop for her 'dhai lakh ka Ghagra, she meets Humpty Sharma, a carefree Delhiite, and falls in love with him.

movies.title: Shaandaar
movies.Plot: In the backdrop of a destination wedding in London, two families try to save their respective empires, unbeknownst to each other.

movies.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
movies.Plot: A Portokalos family secret brings the beloved characters back together for an even bigger and Greeker wedding.

movies.title: Becoming Santa
movies.Plot: A woman brings her boyfriend home for Christmas to meet her parents, Santa and Mrs. Claus. He must decide if he's willing to continue their relationship after learning that he'd be next in line for Santa's job.

movies.title: Kapoor & Sons
movies.Plot: The story about two brothers who visit their dysfunctional family for their grandfather's birthday party.

movies.title: Barakah Meets Barakah
movies.Plot: A middle-class man meets a girl from a rich family, and the two begin dating in a society where such unions are frowned upon.

movies.title: When We First Met
movies.Plot: Noah meets Avery at a Halloween party and falls in love but gets friend-zoned. 3 years later, she's engaged to someone else. Noah returns in a time machine to fix things.

movies.title: Our Lovers
movies.Plot: One man, one woman, one rule: don't fall in love.

movies.title: Naked
movies.Plot: Nervous about finally getting married, a guy is forced to relive the same nerve-wracking hours over and over again until he gets things right on his wedding day.

movies.title: The Kissing Booth
movies.Plot: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush at a kissing booth.

movies.title: Befikre
movies.Plot: It is a carefree love story of Dharam and Shyra, who find love in an engaging series of experiences. Doused in the spirit of Paris, it celebrates a sensual and free-spirited love.

movies.title: To Each, Her Own
movies.Plot: Simone plans to inform her conservative Jewish family that she's a lesbian, but as she proceeds with coming out she finds herself attracted to a man.

movies.title: Alex Strangelove
movies.Plot: Alex, high school class president, nerd and a straight A student, has been dating Claire a long time. They decide to sleep together but then he meets a gay guy and he's confused.

movies.title: The Incredible Jessica James
movies.Plot: An aspiring playwright in New York strikes up a friendship with a guy while on the rebound from a break-up.

movies.title: So My Grandma’s a Lesbian!
movies.Plot: A promising young lawyer sees her plans to wed into an important and ultraconservative family in danger when her grandma decides to marry her girl friend.

movies.title: Set It Up
movies.Plot: Two corporate executive assistants hatch a plan to match-make their two bosses.

movies.title: Nappily Ever After
movies.Plot: Violet Jones tired of waiting for her longtime boyfriend to propose, breaks up with him. But old feelings, and heaps of jealousy, no doubt, arise when he promptly begins dating another woman.

movies.title: The Climb
movies.Plot: A young man from the suburbs with no mountaineering experience decides to climb Mt Everest to show a woman he'd do anything for her.

movies.title: Let It Snow
movies.Plot: In a small town on Christmas Eve, a snowstorm brings together a group of young people.

movies.title: Always Be My Maybe
movies.Plot: Everyone assumed that Sasha and Marcus would wind up together, except for Sasha and Marcus. Reconnecting after 15 years, the two start to wonder--maybe?

movies.title: Someone Great
movies.Plot: After a devastating break up on the eve of her cross-country move, Jenny enjoys one last NYC adventure with her two best pals. Someone Great is a romantic comedy about love, loss, growth and the everlasting bond of female friendship.

movies.title: To All the Boys I’ve Loved Before
movies.Plot: A teenage girl's secret love letters are exposed and wreak havoc on her love life.

movies.title: Jab Harry Met Sejal
movies.Plot: A depressed middle-aged tour guide who lives in his own bubble gets another chance to experience and face reality through a chirpy girl.

movies.title: Love Per Square Foot
movies.Plot: Individually, Sanjay and Karina don't earn enough to be able to buy a home, so they enter into a marriage of convenience.

movies.title: Love Wedding Repeat
movies.Plot: While trying to make his sister's wedding day go smoothly, Jack finds himself juggling an angry ex-girlfriend, an uninvited guest with a secret, a misplaced sleep sedative, and the girl who got away in alternate versions of the sa...

movies.title: Desperados
movies.Plot: A panicked young woman, with her reluctant friends in tow, rushes to Mexico to try and delete a ranting email she sent to her new boyfriend.

movies.title: Sierra Burgess Is a Loser
movies.Plot: A case of mistaken identity results in unexpected romance when the most popular girl and the biggest loser in high school must unite to win over their crushes.

movies.title: The Princess Switch
movies.Plot: Competing in a Christmas baking competition in Belgravia, a Chicago baker bumps into the prince's fiancée--who looks just like her. They switch lives for two days.

movies.title: Eurovision Song Contest: The Story of Fire Saga
movies.Plot: When aspiring musicians Lars and Sigrit are given the opportunity to represent their country at the world's biggest song competition, they finally have a chance to prove that any dream worth having is a dream worth fighting for.

movies.title: Como caído del cielo
movies.Plot: Mexican legend Pedro Infante receives another opportunity on earth to redeem himself for his forays with women and earn heaven in the body of an imitator.

movies.title: Ali's Wedding
movies.Plot: After telling a white lie which spirals out of control, a neurotic, naive, musically gifted Muslim cleric's eldest son must follow through with an arranged marriage, even though he's madly in love with an Australian born-Lebanese ...

movies.title: Lust Stories
movies.Plot: Four short films by four of India's biggest directors exploring love, sex and relationships in modern India.

movies.title: The Last Summer
movies.Plot: Standing on the precipice of adulthood, a group of friends navigate new relationships, while reexamining others, during their final summer before college.

movies.title: Falling Inn Love
movies.Plot: When city girl Gabriela spontaneously enters a contest and wins a rustic New Zealand inn, she teams up with bighearted contractor Jake Taylor to fix and flip it.

movies.title: Tall Girl
movies.Plot: Jodi, the tallest girl in her high school, has always felt uncomfortable in her own skin. But after years of slouching, being made fun of, and avoiding attention at all costs, Jodi finally decides to find the confidence to stand t...

movies.title: The Half Of It
movies.Plot: When smart but cash-strapped teen Ellie Chu agrees to write a love letter for a jock, she doesn't expect to become his friend - or fall for his crush.

movies.title: Zero
movies.Plot: Through his relationships with two wildly different women, a vertically challenged bachelor with a larger-than-life persona must discover his purpose.

movies.title: All the Freckles in the World
movies.Plot: "All the Freckles in the World," set in 1990s Mexico City, is the story of a young-teen boy who is trying to get the attention of the prettiest girl at his school.

movies.title: The Perfect Date
movies.Plot: To save up for college, Brooks Rattigan creates an app where anyone can pay him to play the perfect stand-in boyfriend for any occasion.

movies.title: How to Get Over a Breakup
movies.Plot: A heartbroken ad copywriter living in Lima, Peru, is inspired to write a blog about life as a single woman and is surprised by her website's success.

movies.title: A Castle For Christmas
movies.Plot: To escape a scandal, a bestselling author journeys to Scotland, where she falls in love with a castle - and faces off with the grumpy duke who owns it.

movies.title: Operation Christmas Drop
movies.Plot: Congressional aide Erica forgoes family Christmas to travel at her boss's behest. At a beach side Air Force base, she clashes with Capt. Andrew Jantz, who knows her assignment is finding reasons to defund the facility.

movies.title: The Knight Before Christmas
movies.Plot: A medieval English knight is magically transported to present-day America where he falls for a high school science teacher who is disillusioned by love.

movies.title: The Kissing Booth 2
movies.Plot: In the sequel to 2018's The Kissing Booth', high school senior Elle juggles a long-distance relationship with her dreamy boyfriend Noah, college applications, and a new friendship with a handsome classmate that could change everyt...

movies.title: The Kissing Booth 3
movies.Plot: It's the summer before Elle Evans is set to head off to college, and she has a big decision to make.

movies.title: The Perfect Find
movies.Plot: After a high-profile firing, Jenna's fashion career comeback hits a snag when she falls for a charming, much younger coworker - who happens to be her boss's son. As sparks fly, Jenna must decide if she'll risk it all on a secret r...

movies.title: To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love You
movies.Plot: Lara Jean and Peter have just taken their relationship from pretend to officially official when another recipient of one of her old love letters enters the picture.

movies.title: Jumping from High Places
movies.Plot: To honor her best friend's last wish, a young woman with severe anxiety confronts her greatest fears to try and reclaim her life — and perhaps find love.

movies.title: Despite Everything
movies.Plot: Four different sisters who all have their own little secrets attend their mother's funeral in Madrid, where the will reveals that their dad was not their biological father, so they go on a quest together seeking their biological f...

movies.title: The Wrong Missy
movies.Plot: Tim thinks he's invited the woman of his dreams on a work retreat to Hawaii, realizing too late he mistakenly texted someone from a nightmare blind date.

movies.title: Holidate
movies.Plot: Fed up with being single on holidays, two strangers agree to be each other's platonic plus-ones all year long, only to catch real feelings along the way.

movies.title: Players
movies.Plot: A sports writer unused to relationships falls for a fling, leading her to reconsider playing the field in favor of commitment.

movies.title: Sleeping Princess
movies.Plot: Goku and Krillin want to be trained in the martial arts by the great Master Roshi. The only way he will agree to train them is if they go to Devil's Castle to find the Sleeping Princess, who is being held prisoner by Count Lucifer...

movies.title: To All The Boys: Always And Forever
movies.Plot: Lara Jean's senior year of high school takes center stage when she returns from a family trip to Korea and considers her college plans--with and without Peter.

movies.title: Marry Me
movies.Plot: Music superstars Kat Valdez and Bastian are getting married before a global audience of fans. But when Kat learns, seconds before her vows, that Bastian has been unfaithful, she instead decides to marry Charlie, a stranger in the ...

movies.title: Your Place or Mine
movies.Plot: Two long-distance best friends change each other's lives when she decides to pursue a lifelong dream and he volunteers to keep an eye on her teenage son.

movies.title: Dear Ex
movies.Plot: A teenage boy and his mother are further driven apart when they find out that his father's life insurance policy is to be received by his lover.

movies.title: Sounds Like Love
movies.Plot: Fashion assistant Maca has just about got her life together after a devastating breakup, when Leo, the man who broke her heart returns. Seeking support from best friends, Adriana and Jime, all three will learn love can be complica...

movies.title: Rich in Love
movies.Plot: The Odoms of Charleston, South Carolina have lived a life of the traditions of the American South in their longtime, large-family beachfront home.

movies.title: Look Both Ways
movies.Plot: On the eve of her college graduation, Natalie's life diverges into parallel realities: one in which she becomes pregnant and remains in her hometown to raise her child and another in which she moves to LA to pursue her dream career.

movies.title: You've Got This
movies.Plot: Alex, an advertising creative, wants to be a dad at any cost, but his wife is a lawyer on top of her career and being a mother isn't part of her plans. An unexpected guest will challenge their love.

movies.title: Airplane Mode
movies.Plot: Follows the young Ana, who studied fashion design dreaming of becoming a great stylist but dropped everything to become a digital influencer for a famous brand.

movies.title: Isi & Ossi
movies.Plot: To realize their culinary and boxing dreams, the daughter of a billionaire forms a mutually beneficial alliance with the son of a struggling single mom.

movies.title: Resort to Love
movies.Plot: Erica, who ends up as the entertainment at her ex-fiancé's wedding after reluctantly taking a gig at a luxurious island resort while in the wake of a music career meltdown.

movies.title: Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga
movies.Plot: The film tells the story of closeted lesbian Sweety Chaudhary and her attempts to come out to her conservative, traditional family.

movies.title: Love, Guaranteed
movies.Plot: To save her small law firm, earnest lawyer Susan takes a high-paying case from Nick, a charming new client who wants to sue a dating website that guarantees love. But as the case heats up, so do Susan and Nick's feelings for each ...

movies.title: The Princess Switch: Switched Again
movies.Plot: When Duchess Margaret unexpectedly inherits the throne to Montenaro and hits a rough patch with Kevin, it's up to her double Stacy to save the day before a new lookalike, party girl Fiona foils their plans.

movies.title: Love Hard
movies.Plot: An unlucky-in-love L.A. girl falls for an East Coast guy on a dating app and decides to surprise him for the holidays, only to discover that she's been catfished. This lighthearted romantic comedy chronicles her attempt to reel in...

movies.title: Ready to Mingle
movies.Plot: A wannabe bride seeks professional help to find a husband and, in the process, finds herself.

movies.title: Afterlife of the Party
movies.Plot: During her birthday week, a young female party planner unfortunately dies. Now she must assist a specific selection of people who were in her life in order to move herself to the Above (or Heaven).

movies.title: The Awakening of Motti Wolkenbruch
movies.Plot: Young Jewish man bucks orthodox traditions (and mother's meddling) by shaving, shopping outside the faithful, and considering a shiksa for a wife.

movies.title: Plan A Plan B
movies.Plot: Follows a matchmaker who believes marriage is for everyone except herself, and a successful divorce lawyer with a secret, who cross paths, and explores if opposites coexist or attract.

movies.title: Last Christmas
movies.Plot: Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Working as an elf in a year-round Christmas store is not good for the wannabe singer. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn--that seems too good to be true.

movies.title: Meenakshi Sundareshwar
movies.Plot: Forced to live apart due to a unique job prospect, two newlyweds face the hassles, hiccups - and hilarity - that arise from their long distance marriage.

movies.title: Wedding Season
movies.Plot: Pressured by their parents to find spouses, Asha and Ravi pretend to date during a summer of weddings, only to find themselves falling for each other.

movies.title: The Archies
movies.Plot: Set in 1960s India, Archie and the gang navigate romance, friendship and the future of Riverdale as developers threaten to destroy a beloved park.

movies.title: Single All The Way
movies.Plot: Desperate to avoid his family's judgment about his perpetual single status, Peter convinces his best friend Nick to join him for the holidays and pretend that they're now in a relationship.

movies.title: Someone Borrowed
movies.Plot: A stubborn bachelor hires an actress to play his fiancee to fulfill his dying mother's final wish, and try to avoid her deleting him from her will.

movies.title: The Out-Laws
movies.Plot: A straight-laced bank manager about to marry the love of his life. When his bank is held up by infamous Ghost Bandits during his wedding week, he believes his future in-laws who just arrived in town, are the infamous Out-Laws.

movies.title: Tall Girl 2
movies.Plot: After Jodi Kreyman gains popularity, her miscommunications start causing rifts with those around her and now she really needs to 'stand tall'.

movies.title: You People
movies.Plot: Follows a new couple and their families, who find themselves examining modern love and family dynamics amidst clashing cultures, societal expectations and generational differences.

movies.title: The Royal Treatment
movies.Plot: New York hairdresser Izzy seizes the chance to work at the wedding of a charming prince, but when sparks between them fly, will love or duty prevail?

movies.title: A Perfect Pairing
movies.Plot: It follows a hard-driving LA wine-company executive who travels to an Australian sheep station to land a major client and there she ends up working as a ranch hand and sparking with a rugged local.

movies.title: Baby Mamas
movies.Plot: 'Baby Mamas' is a comedy drama revolving around the daily lives and loves of four professional women who are all in different stages of their own real-life baby mama drama. We meet TOLI, CHANTEL, SANDY and JOY working for an insur...

movies.title: The Lovebirds
movies.Plot: A couple (Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani) experiences a defining moment in their relationship when they are unintentionally embroiled in a murder mystery.

movies.title: Squared Love
movies.Plot: A celebrity journalist and renowned womanizer starts to rethink his life choices after he falls for a mysterious model who leads a double life.

movies.title: Mariposa
movies.Plot: Iqbal (Angga Yunanda) is like a Mariposa butterfly to Acha (Adhisty Zara). Each time someone approach, he always runs away. Acha is determined to win Iqbal, a man known to be handsome, smart, yet cold.

movies.title: The Princess Switch 3: Romancing the Star
Roohi
movies.Plot: Hired to kidnap a bride, two bumbling pals get into a wacky predicament when one falls for their abductee, and the other falls for the spirit that possesses her.

movies.title: All Because of You
movies.Plot: After falling for a guest, an unsuspecting hotel staff becomes embroiled in a hostage scheme and discovers true love in an unlikely place.

movies.title: Love in the Villa
movies.Plot: A young woman takes a trip to romantic Verona, Italy, after a breakup, only to find that the villa she reserved was double-booked, and she'll have to share her vacation with a cynical British man.

movies.title: Love & Gelato
movies.Plot: Lina makes a promise to her sick mother that she'll spend the summer before college in Rome, where she falls for the city, the people - and the "gelato".

movies.title: Whipped
movies.Plot: Four young men - each with their own love issues - enrol in an ‘anti-whipped’ class to break free from being enslaved by love.

movies.title: Seriously Single
movies.Plot: Dineo is the definition of serial monogamist. She dates to fall in love; she falls in love to get married. But she never gets married. She always ends up being dumped. When she meets Lunga Sibiya, he seems to be the man she's wait...

movies.title: Faraway
movies.Plot: Zeynep is unhappy. That's why she flees to a Croatian island, where her deceased mother bought a house long ago. She hopes to find peace and relaxation finally - but she hasn't reckoned with Josip, who still lives on the property.

movies.title: My Oxford Year
movies.Plot: When Anna, an ambitious young American woman, sets out for Oxford University to fulfill a childhood dream, she has her life completely on track until she meets a charming and clever local who profoundly alters both of their lives.

movies.title: Ginny Weds Sunny
movies.Plot: The film follows headstrong Ginny who meets Sunny for an arranged marriage, but turns him down, and then shows how Sunny teams up with Ginny's mother to win her love.

movies.title: Christmas with You
movies.Plot: Follows a pop star who's got a career burnout and escapes to a small town where she finds not only inspiration but a shot of love.

movies.title: Friendzone
movies.Plot: Hopeful romantic Thibault believes his luck could change when sparks fly between him and Rose. But can he go from bestie to boyfriend.

movies.title: Love and Leashes
movies.Plot: Love never hurt so good for two co-workers who enter a contractual relationship as partners in consensual play, pleasure and pain.

movies.title: Laal Singh Chaddha
movies.Plot: The story of Laal Singh Chaddha, a simple man whose extraordinary journey will fill you with love, warmth and happiness.

movies.title: Disconnect
movies.Plot: A romantic comedy that brings out the intricacies and absurdities of the Nairobi dating scene.

movies.title: A Perfect Fit
movies.Plot: Sparks fly when a fashion blogger in Bali meets a gifted shoemaker, leading her to question her commitment to her fiancé.

movies.title: Private Lesson
movies.Plot: Posing as a private tutor, Azra secretly coaches students on achieving their goals in life and love - but not without a few bumps in the road.

movies.title: The Heartbreak Club
movies.Plot: Coping with heartbreak, the shy owner of floundering cafe find solace in the Javanese love songs of Didi Kempot.
